q_en: Please release 100 units of cotton fabric from the Main warehouse.
thought: To release 100 units of cotton fabric from the Main warehouse, I need to identify the warehouse (Main), locate the cotton fabric in the warehouse_material table, and then update the left_number field to decrease it by 100 units.

sqls.command: UPDATE warehouse_material wm INNER JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id INNER JOIN warehouse w ON wm.warehouse_id = w.id SET wm.left_number = wm.left_number - 100 WHERE m.name = 'cotton fabric' AND w.name = 'Main' AND wm.left_number >= 100;

answer:
Certainly! The SQL query to release 100 units of cotton fabric from the Main warehouse has already been provided. Here it is:

```sql
UPDATE warehouse_material wm
INNER JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id
INNER JOIN warehouse w ON wm.warehouse_id = w.id
SET wm.left_number = wm.left_number - 100
WHERE m.name = 'cotton fabric' AND w.name = 'Main' AND wm.left_number >= 100;
```

This query will decrease the number of cotton fabric units by 100 in the Main warehouse, provided that there are at least 100 units available.
